hero.title: Smart matching for qualified patients
hero.subtitle: Match your techniques with the right patient demand

about.title: AI-powered visibility, Gain intelligent patient visibility
about.subtitle: Get automatically recommended by AI assistants based on your profile sheets
about.description: Esthetic Match goes beyond traditional search. Our smart filters allow patients to easily enter their aesthetic concerns and specific needs. The algorithm then matches them with appropriate non-invasive and surgical procedures and presents them with related practitioners. Patients can explore practitioners, view before and after photos, save their favorites, request medical opinions online, and schedule appointments whenever they want.

patient.title: For Patient
patient.line1: Attract qualified patients aligned with your expertise. Highlight your techniques, before/after cases, and outcome metrics. Receive prequalified requests with budget estimates.

practitioner.title: For Practitioners
practitioner.line1: Showcase your signature techniques and stand out for what you do best.
practitioner.line2: Connecting you to patients who are actively seeking exactly what you offer

header.title: Everything you need to attract, qualify, and convert the right patients.
header.subtitle: Clinical translation of patient language using artificial intelligence, targeted to the right practitioners.

feature1.title: Ultra-Precise Filters
feature1.description: Receive requests aligned with your expertise: indication, area, technique, referenced brand/technology — for truly qualified leads.

feature2.title: Intelligent matching & geolocation
feature2.description: Our algorithm directs patients to you based on your specialty, location, and eligibility criteria, for more relevant contacts.

feature3.title: Rich Practitioner Profiles
feature3.description: Showcase your signature techniques, best-of-breed procedures, certifications, before/after results, and verified reviews—all in one place.

feature4.title: Online Medical Opinion
feature4.description: Pre-qualify cases before the appointment: structured questions, secure sending of photos/videos and budget estimation to confirm the right match with confidence.

services.header: All Aesthetic Universes in one App

1.title: Aesthetic Medicine
1.detail: Facial, body, and intimate treatments for beautification and rejuvenation — from injectables to skin boosters and advanced energy-based technologies.

2.title: Aesthetic Surgery
2.detail: Surgical procedures designed to restore harmony between body and mind — boosting self-confidence through personalized body contouring, breast surgery, rhinoplasty, and more.

3.title: Weight Loss & Metabolic Health
3.detail: From medical weight-loss treatments and appetite-regulating therapies to access to dietitians and bariatric surgery guidance — everything to support sustainable results.

4.title: IV Therapy & Wellness Boosts
4.detail: Replenishing therapies for hydration, vitamins, antioxidants, and immunity support — designed to restore balance, energy, and overall wellness.

5.title: Aesthetic Dentistry
5.detail: Smile makeovers made easy: veneers, teeth whitening, invisible aligners, and more — all to help you smile with confidence.

6.title: Hair Restoration & Scalp Health
6.detail: Hair transplants, anti-hair loss treatments, and regenerative therapies for hair growth — tailored to both men and women.

7.title: Laser Hair Removal
7.detail: Permanent hair reduction for face, body, and hairline sculpting — using the latest technologies suited to every skin type.

8.title: Body Shaping & Muscle Toning
8.detail: Sculpt your body with non-invasive muscle stimulation technologies — for a stronger, more defined physique without the gym.

list.quote: In my early twenties, I opted for a procedure abroad after seeing an online promotion, without confirming that it was the right indication or the right practitioner. The poorly performed procedure left me with burns, uneven skin, and discoloration, which took three years to correct. Beyond the cost, the emotional impact was significant. Connecting with the right expert from the start would have changed everything.
list.author: Ms. Zoe Colbert
list.subtitle: Our Community
